item2: Business Environment Midstream segment includes Transportation natural gas liquids (NGL) businesses. Transportation business contains fee-based operations not directly exposed commodity price risk. NGL business, including DCP Midstream Class Segment, DCP Sand Hills Pipeline, LLC (DCP Sand Hills) DCP Southern Hills Pipeline, LLC (DCP Southern Hills), contains both fee-based operations operations directly impacted NGL natural gas prices. weighted-average NGL price $0.60 per gallon during third quarter 2025, compared $0.64 per gallon during third quarter 2024.
